Name: Victory
Texts: End scenario in victory for current player.

Name: Defeat
Texts: End scenario in defeat for current player.

Name: Wait(Don't Use)
Texts: Wait for $Time$ milliseconds. (Not recommended to use)

Name: Transmission
Texts: $Where$에 위치하는 $Unit$의 말하는 애니메이션을 $WAVName$을 재생하면서 보여줍니다. 트랜스 미션 시간을 $Time$ 만큼 $TimeModifier$합니다. $Text$를 $AlwaysDisplay$ 보여줍니다.

Send transmission to current player from $Unit$ at '$Where$'.
Play '$WAVName$'.
Modify transmission duration: $TimeModifier$ $Time$ milliseconds.
Display the following text:
$Text$
$AlwaysDisplay$

Name: CenterView
Texts: Center view for current player at $Where$

Name: LeaderBoardControl
Texts:
Show Leader Board for most control of $Unit$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardControlAt
Texts:
Show Leader Board for most control of $Unit$ at '$Location$'.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardResources
Texts:
Show Leader Board for accumulation of most $ResourceType$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardKills
Texts:
Show Leader Board for most kill of $Unit$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardScore
Texts:
Show Leader Board for most $ScoreType$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: MinimapPing
Texts: Show minimap ping for current player at '$Where$'.

Name: TalkingPortrait
Texts: Show $Unit$ talking to current player for $Time$ milliseconds.

Name: MuteUnitSpeech
Texts: Mute all non-trigger unit sounds for current player.

Name: UnMuteUnitSpeech
Texts: Unmute all non-trigger unit sounds for current player.

Name: LeaderBoardComputerPlayers
Texts: $State$ use of computer players in leaderboard calculations.

Name: LeaderBoardGoalControl
Texts: $Unit$의 보유 수가 $Goal$와 가장 가까운 순으로 $Label$리더보드로 띄웁니다.

Show Leader Board for player closest to control of $Goal$ of $Unit$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardGoalControlAt
Texts: $Location$에 위치하는 $Unit$의 보유 수가 $Goal$와 가장 가까운 순으로 $Label$리더보드로 띄웁니다.

Show Leader Board for player closest to control of $Goal$ of $Unit$ at '$Location$'.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardGoalResources
Texts: $ResourceType$의 채집 량이 $Goal$와 가장 가까운 순으로 $Label$리더보드로 띄웁니다.

Show Leader Board for player closest to accumulation of $Goal$ $ResourceType$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardGoalKills
Texts: $Unit$을 죽인 수가 $Goal$와 가장 가까운 순으로 $Label$리더보드로 띄웁니다.

Show Leader Board for player closest to control of $Goal$ kills of $Unit$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: LeaderBoardGoalScore
Texts:
Show Leader Board for player closest to control of $Goal$ $ScoreType$.
Display Label : '$Label$'

Name: MoveLocation
Texts: Center location labeled '$Location$' on $OnUnit$ owned by $Owner$ at '$DestLocation$'.

Name: LeaderBoardGreed
Texts: 미네랄과 가스의 채집 량이 $Goal$와 가장 가까운 순으로 동시에 리더보드로 띄웁니다.
Show Greed Leader Board for player closest to accumulation of $Goal$ ore and gas.

Name: SetNextScenario
Texts: Load '$ScenarioName$' after completion of current game.

Name: Order
Texts:
Issue order to all $Unit$ owned by $Owner$ at '$StartLocation$':
$OrderType$ to '$DestLocation$'.

Name: ModifyUnitHitPoints
Texts: Set hit points for $Count$ $Unit$ owned by $Owner$. at '$Where$' to $Percent$%.

Name: ModifyUnitEnergy
Texts: Set energy points for $Count$ $Unit$ owned by $Owner$ at '$Where$' to $Percent$%.

Name: ModifyUnitShields
Texts: Set shield points for $Count$ $Unit$ owned by $Owner$. at '$Where$' to $Percent$%%.

Name: ModifyUnitResourceAmount
Texts: Set resource amount for $Count$ resource sources owned by $Owner$. at '$Where$' to $NewValue$.

Name: ModifyUnitHangarCount
Texts: Add at most $Add$ to hangar for $Count$ $Unit$ at '$Where$' owned by $Owner$.

Name: Draw
Texts: End scenario in a draw for all players.

Name: SetDeathsX
Texts: Modify death counts for $Player$: $Modifier$ $Number$ for $Unit$ with $Bitmask$.

Name: SetCurrentPlayer
Texts: Sets the current player variable to $Player$.

Name: SetLight
Texts: Modify screen brightness for the current player: $Modifier$ $Number$. (0 to 31)

Name: CreateArrayVariableEmpty
Texts: Declare the array variable $Name$ with a capacity of $Count$.
Declare the array variable $Name$ with a capacity of $Count$.

Name: Rand
Texts: Modify $Variable$: $VariableModifier$ a random number from 0 to $Count$.

Name: SetVariableCUnitData
Texts: Modify $Variable$: $VariableModifier$ $StructOffset$ for unit with PTR pointer $UnitPTR.

Name: SetVariableCUnitDataEPD
Texts: Modify $Variable$: $VariableModifier$ $StructOffset$ for unit with EPD pointer $UnitEPD$.

Name: SetButton
CodeText:
$UnitBtn$
dwadd_epd(btnPtr, 0);
btnPos += epdread_epd(btnPtr);
oldCP = getcurpl();
DoActions(list(
SetMemory(0x6509B0, SetTo, btnPos),
SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, Offset1, 0),
SetMemory(0x6509B0, Add, 1),
SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, Offset2, 0),
SetMemory(0x6509B0, Add, 1),
SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, Offset3, 0),
SetMemory(0x6509B0, Add, 1),
SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, Offset4, 0),
SetMemory(0x6509B0, Add, 1),
SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, Offset5, 0),
SetMemory(0x6509B0, SetTo, oldCP),
));

Name: ButtonRefresh
ChangeStarText
CodeText:
tct.setTbl($stat_txt$, Offset, len, Dummy);
tct.setTbl($stat_txt$, Offset, len, $Text$)

Name: ChangeButtonEnableMsg
Texts: Set button $BtnUnEnableTxt$’s enabled text to $Text$ at position $Number$.
CodeText:
tct.setTbl($BtnEnableTxt$, Offset, len, Dummy);
tct.setTbl($BtnEnableTxt$, Offset, len, $Text$)

Name: ChangeButtonUnEnableMsg
Texts: Set button $BtnUnEnableTxt$’s disabled text to $Text$ at position $Number$.
CodeText:
tct.setTbl($BtnUnEnableTxt$, Offset, len, Dummy);
tct.setTbl($BtnUnEnableTxt$, Offset, len, $Text$)

Name: SetNextUnitPtr
Texts: 변수 $Variable$에 생성될 유닛의 포인터를 Ptr로 저장합니다.
Set $Variable$ to the PTR pointer for the next created unit.

Name: SetNextUnitEPD
Texts: 변수 $Variable$에 생성될 유닛의 포인터를 EPD로 저장합니다.
Set $Variable$ to the EPD pointer for the next created unit.

Name: SetCUnitData
Texts: Modify unit with PTR pointer $UnitPTR$: Set $StructOffset$ to $SValue$.

Name: AddCUnitData
Texts: Modify unit with PTR pointer $UnitPTR$: Add $SValue$ to $StructOffset$.

Name: SetCUnitDataEPD
Texts: Modify unit with EPD pointer $UnitEPD$: Set $SValue$ to $StructOffset$.

Name: AddCUnitDataEPD
Texts: Modify unit with EPD pointer $UnitEPD$: Add $SValue$ to $StructOffset$.

Name: ChatWrite
Texts: Display $Text$ to all players on line $Line$.

Name: ChatAnnouncement
Texts: Display $CText$ as a centered message(Announcement line) to the current player.

Name: MinimapPingAll
Texts: 로케이션 $Where$에 모든 플레이어한테 미니맵 핑을 합니다.
Show minimap ping for all players at location '$Where$'.

Name: CenterViewAll
Texts: Center view for all players at location '$Where$'

Name: SetMissionObjectivesAll
Texts:
Set Mission Objectives for all players:
$Text$

Name: TalkingPortraitAll
Texts: Show $Unit$ talking to all players for $Time$ milliseconds.

Name: SCDB:UseCustomMsg
Texts: SCDB: Set whether to use a custom message to $Boolean$.

Name: SCDB:LastMsgReset
Texts: SCDB: Reset the last message sent.

Name: SetUnitHitpointsEPD
Texts: Set hitpoints for unit: $UnitEPD$. Set to $Number$
Set hitpoints for unit: $UnitEPD$. Set to $Number$

Name: SetUnitEnergyEPD
Texts: Set energy for unit: $UnitEPD$. Set to $Number$
Set energy for unit: $UnitEPD$. Set to $Number$

Name: SetVariableToNewUnitEPD
Texts: Set $UnitEPD$ to a new $Unit$ created at '$Where$' for $ForPlayer$
Set $UnitEPD$ to a new $Unit$ created at '$Where$' for $ForPlayer$

Name: CreateVariableWithNewUnitEPD
Texts: Declare and set the variable $Name$ to $Unit$ created at '$Where$' for $ForPlayer$.
Declare and set the variable $Name$ to $Unit$ created at '$Where$' for $ForPlayer$.
